queries.sql: SELECT m.*,r.* FROM app_menu m LEFT JOIN app_role r ON r.menu_id = m.menu_id LEFT JOIN app_group g ON r.group_id = g.group_id WHERE r.group_id='1' AND m.deleted_at IS NULL AND m.aktif='1' AND r.akses_lihat='1' ORDER BY urutan ASC;
SELECT m.*,r.* FROM app_menu m LEFT JOIN app_role r ON r.menu_id = m.menu_id LEFT JOIN app_group g ON r.group_id = g.group_id WHERE m.prefik='aktivitas-harian' ;
SELECT SUM(ah.poin) as total FROM aktivitas_harian ah WHERE MONTH(ah.tanggal_kegiatan)='04' AND YEAR(ah.tanggal_kegiatan)='2021' AND ah.nip='199202062020121004' AND ah.is_approve='Ya' GROUP BY ah.nip

SELECT SUM(ah.poin) as total FROM aktivitas_harian ah WHERE MONTH(ah.tanggal_kegiatan)='04' AND YEAR(ah.tanggal_kegiatan)='2021' AND ah.nip='199202062020121004' AND ah.is_approve='Belum' GROUP BY ah.nip
SELECT skp.* FROM susunan_skp skp INNER JOIN periode_skp periode ON periode.periode_id= skp.periode_id WHERE periode.is_default='Ya' AND skp.nip='199202062020121004' AND skp.target_acc='Ya'
